imdb.plot outline: The twin brothers - Julius and Verne - are little genius explorers of the world's things and curiosities. By the time they are 7, they will try to understand the challenges of being a child in each phase, from childhood to pre-adolescence, facing dilemmas and helping their friends to overcome those moments. The cartoon characters travel back in time through the tight embrace of their pet Soneca - a sloth - interacting with personalities and historical events to learn how children lived at different times in history and how they dealt with their discoveries and conflicts.
imdb.title: Jùlio & Verne: Cool Twins
plot: It is an animated series, inspired on Jules Verne's fantastic work, which shows kids that growing up may seem like a 7-headed creature, but it's actually a great adventure.

The twin brothers - Julius and Verne - are little genius explorers of the world's things and curiosities. By the time they are 7, they will try to understand the challenges of being a child in each phase, from childhood to pre-adolescence, facing dilemmas and helping their friends to overcome those moments. The cartoon characters travel back in time through the tight embrace of their pet Soneca - a sloth - interacting with personalities and historical events to learn how children lived at different times in history and how they dealt with their discoveries and conflicts.
